author: newsr.in
title: Gold Box – up to 45% off gaming gear: SteelSeries iPhone controller $45, ViewSonic 28″ monitor $187, much more
text: Today only, as its Bonus Gold Box Deal of the Day, Amazon offers up to 45% off gaming gear including select mice, controllers, monitors, headsets, and more. Every item qualifies for 2-day Prime shipping. Anyone who’s not a Prime member will have to spend at least $35 to get shipping fees waived for their order. […] »
